snippet.title: Omnibus Funny Gameplay Trailer  | Omnibus The Game Public Alpha Demo (INDIE)
snippet.description:
A funny gameplay trailer of Omnibus. It showcases Omnibus and its chaotic driving in all its glory. This is fan-made and I have no affiliation with the development of the game. 

OmniBus is a crazy Playstation 1 style physics game about the unstoppable force of nature that is OMNIBUS! The main mechanic of the game is trying to control the bus without being able to stop or slow down, while also slowly increasing in speed over time.

This is the public alpha demo build. Right now, it's free! The full game is expected to include more buses and maps. 

Random ➤ https://youtu.be/GbpYB6kDTZI

Gameplay:

There are two modes: Story Mode and Free Roam. In Story Mode, there are 5 levels, each with different objectives. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Omnibus Public Alpha Demo Download: http://buddycops.itch.io/omnibus
